sys_ux_client_script.name: Refresh List

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_7e32625c902202105b31af828fe66bb3
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="">3232625ca5220210b104d6b8c58ee2d2</macroponent><name>Refresh List</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({api, event: {payload, payload: {name, value}}, helpers, imports}) {
    if (name === 'activityLogs' && value && value.size > 0) {
        const operationList = ['modified', 'inserted', 'deleted', 'closed'];
        // Transform "value" and get the latest entry
        const map = Array.from(value).pop()[1];        
        const {operation, sysId, timestamp} = map.activities.get('crud')[0];
        if (operationList.includes(operation) && sysId !== "-1") {
            api.setState('listRefresh', {timestamp, background: true });
        }         
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-29 17:32:32</sys_created_on><sys_id>7e32625c902202105b31af828fe66bb3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Refresh List</sys_name><sys_package display_value="My Template App" source="x_1434439_my_tem_0">7232625c53220210d9568cfbe92e8074</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="My Template App">7232625c53220210d9568cfbe92e8074</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_7e32625c902202105b31af828fe66bb3</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-29 17:32:32</sys_updated_on><target/><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
